channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken glass at end of Derwent Grove, 12th October
item.description:
Broken glass across pavement and in road Present for 2 days

item.title: Cars parking on drop curbs pathway, 12th October
item.description:

item.title: Yellow pedestrian barriers around the tree, 12th October
item.description:
For a few months now, there have been yellow pedestrian barriers around or near the tree outside 68 Anerley park. Can we get an update please on if/when work will take place here. A large piece of stone was removed and not put back.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Park, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barricade blocking FP114, 12th October
item.description:
Yellow plastic barricade material is blocking FP114 at 24 Crayford Way. I came down it from the NW and had to go all the way back to Green Walk and go round to re-join it at Crayford Way southwards towards the river.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crayford Way, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household rubbish dumped on street, 12th October
item.description:

item.title: Mixed waste at this regular dumping site, 12th October
item.description:
Hackney commercial sacks but also other random household items next to the tree at junction of Westgate St and Mare St outside Elliots. There is rubbish dumped here daily.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
